plugin.name: 🕵️ Unlinked Note Finder
plugin.description: Find unlinked notes in your notes
plugin.author: aaronpoweruser

plugin.commands.name: Find unlinked notes in current note
plugin.commands.description: Search for unlinked notes in the current note.

plugin.commands.name: Find unlinked notes in all notes
plugin.commands.description: Search for unlinked notes in all notes. This may take a while depending on the number of notes you have.

plugin.commands.name: onMessageFromHTMLView
plugin.commands.description: aaronpoweruser.UnlinkedNoteFinder: Callback function to receive messages from HTML view

plugin.commands.name: Unlinked Note Finder: Update Plugin Settings

plugin.settings.COMMENT: This is for use by the editSettings helper function. PluginID must match the plugin.id in the top of this file

plugin.settings.NOTE: DO NOT CHANGE THE FOLLOWING SETTINGS; ADD YOUR SETTINGS ABOVE ^^^

plugin.settings.title: Log Level
plugin.settings.description:
Set how much logging output will be displayed when executing Unlinked Note Finder commands in NotePlan Plugin Console Logs (NotePlan -> Help -> Plugin Console)

 - DEBUG: Show All Logs
 - INFO: Only Show Info, Warnings, and Errors
 - WARN: Only Show Errors or Warnings
 - ERROR: Only Show Errors
 - none: Don't show any logs
